Uses of Class
jGame.core.ui.hud.UIHudElement

Packages that use UIHudElement
Package Description
jGame.core.launcher
The main package of the framework, where the entry point for every game (GameLauncher) is located.
jGame.core.ui
This class holds a collection of UI-related classes, such as a displayable window or utility functionality to aid in the process of window-making.
jGame.core.ui.hud
This package contains classes responsible for implementing a HUD system, with a central class (UIHud) maintaining a list of elements to be displayed after the game updates.

  • Uses of UIHudElement in jGame.core.ui.hud

    Subclasses of UIHudElement in jGame.core.ui.hud
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  UIHudBoxElement
    Creates a colored square.
    class  UIHudButtonElement
    This class represents a "clickable" element rendered on the screen, that could respond to user input.
    class  UIHudCheckBoxElement
    Class representing a toggable checkbox.
    class  UIHudDropdownElement
    Dropdown list of "clickable" buttons to fit inside a reduced space that appears and disappears when the users clicks this element.
    class  UIHudElementGroup
    Represents a group of UIHudElements to be grouped in a certain area.
    class  UIHudInputBoxElement
    Class representing an input box, to which the user can write a string of text.
    class  UIHudProgressBarElement
    Progress bar that tracks progression of anything that requires so.
    class  UIHudSliderElement
    Class responsible for creating a horizontal slider, in order to get a value in a certain range.
    class  UIHudTextElement
    This class represents a textual visual element whose only purpose is to display a piece of text to the screen.
